statements: SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, status FROM orders;
SELECT total_amount, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 123
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE status = 'shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY order_count DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM OrderItems WHERE order_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sum(quantity) as total_quantity FROM Orders JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM Orders JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING avg_price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM OrderItems ORDER BY item_id DESC
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM OrderItems WHERE price > 50
SELECT status_id, status, status_date FROM OrderStatus
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC, customer_id
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount < 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.customer_id, Orders.total_amount, OrderItems.product_id, OrderItems.quantity, OrderItems.price FROM Orders JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id WHERE Orders.customer_id = 1001 AND OrderItems.quantity > 5

SELECT Orders.order_date, OrderItems.product_id, OrderItems.quantity, OrderItems.price, OrderStatus.status FROM Orders INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id LEFT JOIN OrderStatus ON Orders.order_id = OrderStatus.order_id WHERE Orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, OrderItems.product_id, SUM(OrderItems.price) AS total_price FROM Orders JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, OrderItems.product_id HAVING total_price > 500
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM OrderDetails;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.total_amount, Products.product_name FROM Orders JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.order_id = OrderDetails.order_id JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, item_total FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_items.quantity, order_items.item_total FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
